description:
Job Title: Lemon Law Attorney

Location: Fully Remote (Based in Los Angeles, CA)


About Us:

The client is a premier law firm specializing in consumer protection and lemon law cases. They are dedicated to advocating for the rights of consumers who have purchased defective vehicles. The team is committed to providing top-notch legal representation and ensuring that our clients receive the compensation they deserve.


Job Description:

They are seeking a skilled and motivated Lemon Law Attorney to join our team. As a Lemon Law Attorney, you will be responsible for handling a variety of lemon law cases from inception to resolution. This position is fully remote, allowing you to work from the comfort of your home while serving clients in the Los Angeles, CA area.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Represent clients in lemon law cases, including but not limited to vehicles, RVs, boats, and other consumer goods.
  • Conduct thorough case evaluations and provide clients with clear legal guidance and options.
  • Draft and file legal documents, including complaints, motions, and briefs.
  • Negotiate settlements with manufacturers and dealerships on behalf of clients.
  • Litigate cases in state and federal courts as necessary.
  • Maintain regular communication with clients, keeping them informed of case progress.
  • Collaborate with other attorneys and legal staff to ensure comprehensive case management.
  • Stay up-to-date with relevant laws, regulations, and industry trends.


Qualifications:

  • Juris Doctor (JD) degree from an accredited law school.
  • Active license to practice law in California.
  • 2+ years of experience in lemon law or consumer protection law.
